message.body: Hey! Hope your writing session is going well! I am packing up speakers, popcorn, small cooler with ice, extra VGA converter. Let me know if we need anything else!
I changed my session till tomorrow - I got gin,limes and blueberries , just need to get some seltzer and l can also bring another projector
I can pick up seltzer when I get ice!
If we need more we can just run to the corner store.
Yeah no problem. See you in an hour or so
Yes! I may go there a bit early.
That was so great last night! I am glad you initiated it. Sorry if I was spacey at all.
I had such a good time!!! You have such lovely friends. Hope your day is good and sending you good energy to help your friend up north with her Dad.
Thanks! Once things settle down lets make a studio date.
